title: wttf: Ty Cobb T206 poor-have T206 Cy Young Portrait+Matty 205 FT
author: frankh8147

posts.post_title: wttf: Ty Cobb T206 poor-have T206 Cy Young Portrait+Matty 205 FT
posts.post_content:
Good morning,

I am looking to trade or do a part trade/part cash deal for a Ty Cobb T206 (bat on, either portrait, or even a T205) IN POOR condition.  For trade I have a T206 Young, a T205 Matty and some cash in my Paypal account I can throw in.  As always, I am more than willing to deal in your favor.  Let me know what you have and enjoy your Sunday!  -Frank
Bump- trading in your favor and can add cash from paypal- anyone?
